location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 95 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'a'; '43'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject MatterMarket scene in Ahwaz [Ahvaz]. High stone walls at right extend into the distant background along which rows of reed-covered stalls sell earthenware pots and other wares. At centre a man walks through the scene. At left the supporting columns, made from twisted trunks, of the canopy overhead can be seen.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: 'Ahwaz'Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘b’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘44’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘(April 1917)’
